name: Pragmatic Semiconductor
description: The ideal candidate will work with the OPS-Smart Factory Management team to identify MES/SPC/Reporting requirements, oversee and develop team members, prioritize data-driven opportunities, formulate project strategies, support in the design and maintenance of data-flow channels, uphold SOPs, and ensure compliance with ISO audit best practices – they should have a degree in a related field, experience leading a team of software engineers, and be proficient in database systems and programming languages.
